entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 04:49 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Local blowing snow. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
